title: How to Cook Russian Braised Cabbage

steps.headline: Heat some canola or olive oil in a pan.
Cut one red onion and one yellow onion into fine rings.
steps.description: Fry the onion on low heat.

steps.headline: Peel and grate 3 medium sized carrots and add them to the pan.
Take 1/2 head of a white cabbage and cut it into fine strips.
Simmer on low heat for about 20 minutes and stir occasionally.
steps.description: Add salt and pepper to taste. If necessary, add some oil, but don't overdo.

steps.headline: Mix about 10 oz of tomato paste with 10 oz of cold water.
steps.description: Add 1 teaspoon. of basil, 1 teaspoon of oregano, 1 teaspoon of marjoram, 1/2 teaspoon ginger, and 1/2 teaspoon of nutmeg. Mix it all well. Add to the pan.

steps.headline: Cover the pan.
steps.description: Let it braise on low heat, covered. Stir occasionally till all the liquid is gone.

steps.headline: Serve it hot or cold.
steps.description: It is yummy either way. It goes well with potatoes and your choice of protein.

text: Frying the Ingredients Heat some canola or olive oil in a pan.  Cut one red onion and one yellow onion into fine rings. Fry the onion on low heat. Peel and grate 3 medium sized carrots and add them to the pan.  Take 1/2 head of a white cabbage and cut it into fine strips. Add to the pan. Simmer on low heat for about 20 minutes and stir occasionally. Add salt and pepper to taste. If necessary, add some oil, but don't overdo. Braising the Cabbage Mix about 10 oz of tomato paste with 10 oz of cold water. Add 1 teaspoon. of basil, 1 teaspoon of oregano, 1 teaspoon of marjoram, 1/2 teaspoon ginger, and 1/2 teaspoon of nutmeg. Mix it all well. Add to the pan. Cover the pan. Let it braise on low heat, covered. Stir occasionally till all the liquid is gone. Serve it hot or cold. It is yummy either way. It goes well with potatoes and your choice of protein.
